company_address: Opposite of Gazipur Biggan College, BIDC Road, Joydebpur, Gazipur City Corporation
job_description:
Responsibilities: Dear Candidate,

Astha IT Limited is pleased to announce that we are hiring skilled and experienced Flutter Mobile Developers.

ЁЯФ╣ Position: Flutter Mobile Developer
ЁЯФ╣ Experience: Minimum 2 years
ЁЯФ╣ Location: Gazipur City Corporation

ЁЯФ╣ Required Skills:
- Android/iOS app development using Flutter
- Backend API development using Laravel
- MySQL database management
- Good understanding of REST API integration
- Basic knowledge of project deployment and server management

ЁЯФ╣ Additional Qualifications:
- Ability to work in a team
- Skill in writing clean and optimized code
- Quick decision-making in problem-solving

We are looking for candidates who are responsible, punctual, and willing to work long-term.

ЁЯУй asthaitlimited@gmail.com

Please mention "Application for Flutter Developer" in the subject line of the email.

Only selected candidates will be contacted.

Thank you,
Astha IT Limited

Requirements: ЁЯФ╣ Technical Requirement (Flutter)
At least 2 years of experience in Android and iOS app development using Flutter
Good understanding of State Management (Provider / GetX / Bloc)
Experience in REST API Integration
Skills in Responsive UI Design and writing Clean Code
Priority given to experience in Firebase / Push Notification integration
Good to have experience in App Publish (Play Store)

ЁЯФ╣ Technical Requirement (Laravel)
At least 2 years of experience in Laravel Framework
Skills in RESTful API Development
Experience in creating Authentication & Authorization System
Knowledge of MySQL Database Design and Optimization
Clear understanding of CRUD operations and MVC Architecture
Understanding of API Security (JWT / Sanctum)

ЁЯФ╣ Database (MySQL)
Skills in Database Structure Design
Query Optimization
Understanding of Relationships (One to One / One to Many / Many to Many)
Basic knowledge of Backup & Data Security

ЁЯФ╣ Additional Qualifications
Experience in using Git
Team player mentality
Habit of delivering projects on time
Problem-solving skills
Good communication skills

ЁЯФ╣ Profile
Experience: Minimum 2 years
Location: Only Bangladeshi candidates
Full-time / Remote (mention as per requirement)

company_address: Opposite of Gazipur Biggan College, BIDC Road, Joydebpur, Gazipur City Corporation
job_description:
Responsibilities: Soft Vio IT, a reputable IT company, is hiring experienced Sales and Marketing Officers. Interested candidates are requested to apply promptly. ЁЯФ░ Responsibilities: Introducing software to schools, colleges, and educational institutions, conducting demos and presentations Identifying new clients, visiting them, and building relationships Ensuring software sales according to sales targets Conducting market research, lead generation, and regular follow-ups Understanding clients' needs and providing appropriate solutions and price proposals Updating CRM/reports, preparing daily/weekly sales reports Explaining software features and providing basic training assistance as needed Salary and Benefits: Salary: 20,000 - 25,000 BDT Incentives: Attractive incentive policy 2 Eid bonuses Opportunities for promotion and various other benefits ЁЯУН Location: ЁЯУМ Mirpur ЁЯУМ ЁЯУМ Uttara ЁЯУМ ЁЯУМ Tongi ЁЯУМ ЁЯУМ Gazipur ЁЯУМ

Requirements: Qualifications: Minimum 1-2 years of experience in sales/marketing (preferably in software/IT sales) Bachelor's degree in any subject (additional advantage if in marketing/computer science) Educational qualifications flexible for more experienced candidates Interest and basic understanding of technology and software Strong communication and presentation skills Goal-oriented mindset Contact: Mr. Mehedi Hasan 01942845813 Office Location: Opposite Gazipur Commerce College, BIDC Road, Joydevpur, Gazipur City Corporation. [Interview Date: 15th February, 9 am to 4 pm] [Note: Inexperienced candidates need not apply for sales/marketing positions]

company_address: House No 1, Lane No 4, Block D , Mirpur 11, Dhaka 1216
job_description:
Responsibilities: WE ARE HIRING! Company: Grofast Digital Position: Video Editor Cum Motion Graphic Location: On Site (House No 1, Lane No-4, Block-E, Bauniabadh, Miprur 11, Pallabi, Dhaka-1216) Number of Vacancy: 01 Employment Type: Full-time Working Hours: 9 Hours About Us: Grofast Digital is a fast-growing marketing agency helping brands scale through strategy, creativity, and performance. WeтАЩre looking for a Video Editor who can transform ideas into stunning visuals, tell brand stories with motion and design, and bring fresh, modern energy to our creative team. Job Responsibilities: - Design eye-catching graphics for social media, website and marketing campaigns. - Edit and produce high-quality promotional videos, reels and motion visuals. - Develop creative concepts aligned with Grofast Digital brand identity. - Collaborate with the Content and Marketing Team to bring ideas to life. - Design packaging, product labels and other branding materials as needed. - Ensure all visuals are on-brand, consistent in style and optimized for digital use. - Stay updated with design trends, social media styles and creative innovations. Salary and Benefits: - 35-40k (based on experience and skill). - Salary Increment: Once a year, based on performance. - Festival Bonus: Twice per year. - Promotion Opportunities: Based on performance. - Creative Environment: Friendly team, open communication and growth opportunities. Application Deadline: 25 February 2026 How to Apply: Please send your Resume, Portfolio, and a Short Cover Letter to < > mentioning your position in the subject line. [e.g., Application Video Editor]

Requirements: ```html Experience & Qualifications Proven Expertise: 1тАУ3 years of professional experience in Graphic Design, Video Editing, and Motion Graphics. Technical Mastery: High proficiency in Adobe Creative Suite, specifically Photoshop, Illustrator, Premiere Pro, and After Effects, Davinci Resolve. Creative Excellence: A strong creative vision with an expert eye for detail, color theory, and composition. Execution: Proven ability to manage tight deadlines and deliver high-quality work under pressure. Collaboration: Exceptional communication skills and a "team-first" mentality. Bonus Points Background in Cinematography or Professional Photography . Experience in Video Content Creation and narrative storytelling (Drama/Cinema). Strong foundation in Creative Strategy and conceptual thinking. ```
